name: African American Landmark Tour beta 1.0
description:
These places were all important in some way to the history of civil rights and the African American experience in South Bend, Indiana. This app lets you see, hear, and learn about them in a new way.

Tap the arrow to get directions to where they are.

Tap the "AR" button to learn how you can line up your phone and see a historic photograph of how it used to look.

Tap the name of the site to read more, and maybe hear a short clip of someone speaking about it.
